Version: 2.1
Build id: 200302061700
sun jdk 1.4.1
comes up when debugging a runtime workbench
and hitting a breakpoint the second or nth time
it is not always the same period of time, hard to recreate,
then the entire runtime vm crashes
while I am not sure if it is the vm thats crashing first
- but no problems prior 2.1 (last version i had installed was the 2.0.2)

Unable to reproduce. Uwe, are you still getting this problem on 2.1? Can you
come up with a reproducible test case?

Can't reproduce. There's very little chance we'd be able to do something about
a VMDisconnectedException anyway. These exceptions have always come from
problems in the VM.

i have not yet debugged with the 2.1 release, surely the problem has already 
gone... if not i still can reopen the bug,penetrantly;)
